name: controle-financeiro-pessoal
description: Aplicativo web para controle financeiro pessoal com assistente AI.

scripts.start: echo "No start script configured, serve index.html with a static server." && exit 1
scripts.build: echo "Starting build process..." && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html metadata.json index.tsx App.tsx constants.tsx types.ts ErrorBoundary.tsx dist/ && cp -r components hooks screens utils dist/ && echo "Frontend files copied to dist. API folder remains at root for Vercel Serverless Functions."
